title: Acer VN7-592G Gaming Laptop- battery issue
message:
acer vn7-592g runs fine on wall charger.
Windows shows battery charging.
Purchased 2 new batteries and have same issue.
If power cord is removed, system powers off...
If trying to start system on battery only, system powers on, then off again in a few seconds. Then repeats until battery is fully dead, unless wall power is provided again.
Removed KB, HDD, RGB, Touchpad... None of these seem to be causing the issue...
I'm not even sure where to start on this one..

title: Acer VN7-592G Gaming Laptop- battery issue
